name: Hero of Town RPG Action Game
name_original: Hero of Town RPG Action Game
description:
How to Play:

Use Arrow Keys to Move   |   "x" to Sword Attack   |   "c" to Special Attack

There are mutant mosquitoes in Town! Is too dangerous out there!
Someone needs to figure out what's going on and solve the problem.
It is you, the awesome hero person, who can take the first step to help the Town. Remember, you're not alone, there's always a friend willing to help you if you need. You just have to talk to the right person.

Game Features:
- Hero of Town is completely free!
- Choose different ways to fight mutant mosquitoes
- You can use different strategies to save the Town as fast as you can

Let's save the Town!

If you enjoy the game, please consider checking out the android version on the Google Play Store and give your feedback! iOS version will be available soon.
